Thought I'd share some sample code for using JUnit to test SOAP-based
servi=
ce-oriented architectures.

http://michael01612.spaces.live.com/blog/cns!2D=
894EF96C8FC0!2059.entry

Uses Paramterized Test Case Design Pattern (JUnit =
Recipes, 4.8). 
XMLUnit to do XML-based assertions using XPath.  Data-drive=
n in that
it  reads testcases from a filesystem (test case defined as an XM=
L
request, an XPath, and a value).

Maybe it will help someone else.
